issue_title: [Feature] 添加可选 debug 日志功能

acceptance_criteria.log_content: Logs include file path, operation type, duration, and error info
acceptance_criteria.default_false: debug defaults to False when not specified

implementation_notes.approach: Added debug: bool = False parameter to __init__. When enabled, uses Python's logging module to record load/save operations with file path, size, duration, and temp file info.
key_changes: Added time import for duration tracking
Added debug logging in load() for file not found, JSON errors, and successful loads
Added debug logging in save() for temp file creation, successful saves, and errors
implementation_notes.risks: Minimal - new parameter defaults to False, so existing code is unaffected
implementation_notes.limitations: Debug logging requires proper log handler configuration at application level
